item.title: Moroccan Lentil Quinoa Soup
item.description: Ingredients (serves 4 people) 1 onion, finley diced 5-6 garlic cloves, finely diced 3 carrots, diced 1 red bell pepper, diced 1 chili, diced 1 can diced tomatoes 2 ts cumin 1 ts chili powder 1 ts coriander 1 ts cinnamon 1 ts thyme 1 ts turmeric 1 ts honey 55g quinoa 200g red lentils 1L broth To serve herbs (choose either cilantro, parsley, scallions, mint) squirt of lemon/lice juice yogurt (optional) radishes (optional) raisins (optional) Instructions: Saute onion and garlic Add spices, stir until fragrant Add carrots, bell pepper and chili, stir for 2m Add tomatoes and broth, add lentils and quinoa Bring to a boil, then let it simmer until the lentils are cooked (around 15m) Serve after the stew thickened

item.title: Kartoffelpfannkuchen
item.description: Ingredients (For 8 pancakes) 1kg potatoes 2 medium sized onions 3 eggs fresh parsley fresh chives chestnut flour to bind, around 130gr Optional Clove of garlic, finely diced Bacon cubes To Serve Applesauce Instructions First peel potatoes and onion, then finely grate them Squeeze mass to make it a bit dryer Give eggs, parsley, chives, chestnut, salt & pepper to mass, mix it Give oil or some fat to a pan, bake individually

item.title: Pumpkin Soup
item.description: Ingredients (Serves 4 people) 1 red kuri squash (0.8 - 1kg) 1 onion, finely chopped 1 clove garlic, finely chopped 1 thumb sized ginger, finely chopped 2 Tbsp butter -1L broth 100ml cream Optional Juice of 1 orange 1 ts red curry paste To Serve Fresh parsley Instructions Cut squash to small chunks, remove seeds Heat up pot, add butter, saute onion, garlic and ginger If you’re using red curry paste, add after a minute Add squash, wait for a minute until deglazing with the stock Bring to a boil then simmer for 15-20m Add cream (and optionally the orange juice) Use blender and serve with fresh parsley

item.title: Eggplant Paste
item.description: Ingredients (4 persons) 2 eggplants 1 package of feta (200g) 4-6 cloves of garlic olive oil Instructions Slice the eggplants length-wise, cover the cut surface with olive oil Set the oven to 220C°, put the eggplants in the oven, lay them on the cut surface, leave in oven for 40m Slice the garlic, wait for the eggplant Give feta, eggplants and garlic to a food processor until the paste has the right consistency Add salt & pepper

item.title: Kisir
item.description: Ingredients (2 persons) 100g bulgur 1/2 onion, finely diced 1/2 cucumber, remove seeds, finely diced 1 tomato, finely diced 1 Tbsp tomato paste 1 Tbsp pepperbell paste 2 Tbsp olive oil a squirt of lemon juice 1 Tbsp paprika To serve fresh parsley Instructions Add bulgur to a pot, add already boiled water until water rose 2cm above bulgur Heat up a pan, saute the onion with some oil Add pepperbell and tomato paste to the pan Deglaze with some water Add content of pan to the bulgur Remove the seeds from the cucumber and dice it to cubes After bulgur has cooled down, add the diced tomato, cucumber and lemon juice Add salt, pepper and paprika Serve with chopped parsley

item.title: Lentil Salad
item.description: Ingredients (2 persons) 100g lentils (green or brown) handful of cherry tomatoes 1-2 spring onions optional: feta For the sauce: 1 ts honey 1,5 Tbsp olive oil 1,5 Tbsp balsamico mustard a squirt of lemon juice Instructions Add lentils to water, bring to boil, simmer for around 20m-30m In the meantime, quarter all cherry tomatoes, chop spring onions to rings Mix the ingredients for the sauce After the lentils are done, add everything together, add salt & pepper

item.title: Sweetpotatoe Curry
item.description: Ingredients: 500g sweetpotatoes, diced 1 pepperbell, diced 200g red lentils 2 medium-sized onions, diced 2 garlic cloves, minced 400ml coconut milk 250ml water 3 Tbsp tomato paste 1 can of diced tomatoes 3 ts curry powder 3 ts turmeric 3 ts garam masala 1 ts cumin a pinch of nutmeg Instructions Heat up pot, add oil, saute onions and garlic Add spices, stir until fragrant Add sweetpotatoes, pepperbell and lentils Deglaze with water, coconut milk and tomatoes.

item.title: Matcha Mascarpone Pots
item.description: Ingredients 4-6 servings 2 Tbsp full fat milk 1 Tbsp matcha, plus a little extra for dusting 1 Tbsp vanilla extract / seeds from 1 vanilla pod 500g mascarpone at room temperature 75g creme fraiche 75g sugar pinch of salt Instructions Whisk milk and matcha until the lumps are gone Add all the other ingredients Whisk until everything is smooth, then keep whisking to thicken Sprinkle a bit matcha on top for decoration

item.title: French Onion Soup
item.description: Ingredients Serves 4 people 600g onions, peeled and thinly sliced 1 clove garlic, finely chopped 3 Tbsp butter 1 1/4 L stock White wine 100g cheese, grated (Bergkäse or gruyère) Salt Pepper Bay leaves, thyme (optionally 1 ts of crushed caraway) Baguette Instructions Caramelize onions, that takes about 15-20m Deglaze with white wine Add stock, bay leaves and thyme. Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer for ~30m Heat the oven to ~220°C, add soup to bowls, sprinkle cheese and leave until the cheese is golden

item.title: Butternut Squash Curry
item.description: Ingredients 300g red lentils, dried 1 butternut squash, small cubes 1 onion, finely chopped 2-3 garlic cloves, finely chopped 400ml coconut milk (1 can) 400ml diced tomatoes (1 can) 1 Tbsp curry powder 2 ts ground coriander 2 ts garam masala 2 ts turmeric 2 ts ground cumin 2 ts ground ginger 1-2 cups vegetable stock For Serving 1 Tbsp salt 1/2 lime Naan Instructions Wash lentils thoroughly Heat up pan, add some oil, glaze onion and garlic Add spices, fry until fragrant Put everything to slow cooker, cook on low for 8 hours Before serving season with salt, add juice of lime

item.title: Dal Lemon Rice
item.description: Ingredients Dal 300g yellow lentils 2 cloves garlic (1 finely chopped, 1 crushed) 1/2 white onion, finely chopped 2 ts turmeric 2 ts cumin seeds (1 of them crushed) 3/4 tsp ground ginger 1 ts ground coriander 1 ts curry powder 1 ts crushed chilis 200g chopped tomatoes 700ml vegetable stock ~10 curry leaves (optional) Rice Basmati rice 1 lemon 1 ts mustard seeds 1 ts crushed chilis 1/2 ts ground ginger 1 ts turmeric Instructions Dal Add lentils, crushed garlic, crushed cumin, turmeric, ginger, coriander, curry powder, chillies, chopped tomatoes and curry leaves to slow cooker Add stock, set on HIGH for 2 hours Fry cumin seeds and chopped garlic in 2 tbsp sunflower oil until garlic has browned and cumin is fragrant.

item.title: Oriental Lentil Soup
item.description: Ingredients 2 onions, minced 1 clove garlic, minced 2 carrots, minced 2 Tbsp olive oil 1 chili (or alternatively 1 Tbsp thai curry paste) 1½ Tbsp cumin 100g dried apricots, finely chopped 250g red lentils 1 can of tomatoes, in pieces 1,2l vegetable stock salt, pepper To serve lemon juice yogurt parsley, chopped Instructions Sauté onions, garlic and carrots with oil in a pot Add the rest of the ingredients except for the salt Cook until the lentils are done (for slowcookers: HIGH ~4h, LOW: ~8h) Serve with lemon juice, a bit of yogurt and parsley

item.title: Roasted Eggplant
item.description: Serving Size Serves 1 person Ingredients 1 eggplant 2-3 Tbsp olive oil 1 Tbsp soy sauce 1 ts ras el-hanout Alternative Use the seasoned soy sauce for and add ground ginger instead the sauce above Instructions Pre-heat oven at 175°C Cut eggplant in half Cut the flesh of the eggplant in a diamond shape Add ingredients for the sauce to a small bowl and mix well together Cover the eggplant with the sauce Bake for around 20-25m

item.title: Tiramisu
item.description: Ingredients 4 fresh eggs Savoiardi biscuits 300g (“ladyfingers”) Mascarpone 500g Sugar 75g Cacao powder Coffee Instructions Separate yolks from egg whites in two different bowls (medium size) Add half of the sugar to the yolks and whip them until they become like a cream, then add the mascarpone Now whip the egg whites - pouring the remaining sugar a little at a time - until stiff Add them to the yolks cream, stirring slowly without changing direction Prepare a coffee pot (two medium mokas are enough), spread a little cream in a baking tray and start placing the biscuits soaked in coffee (tip: do not soak them too much - they shouldn’t melt).

item.title: Elisenlebkuchen
item.description: Ingredients 6 eggs 90g sugar 2 Tbsp honey 1 package of Lebkuchengewürz 1 pinch of salt 250g ground almonds 250g ground hazelnuts 100g orangeat (candied orange) 100g zitronat (candied lemon) wafers 250 chocolate Instructions Whisk eggs, sugar and honey Put orangeat and zitronat in a mixer and create a fine-grained substance Mix all the ingredients together Form small balls from the mass and put it on the wafers Bake at 150-160°C for about 20-30 minutes Cover the Lebkuchen with chocolate after they got colder

item.title: Butter Cookies
item.description: Ingredients: 200g flour 60-75g sugar 175 butter 1 egg Optional: 2 tb matcha powder 1 vanilla pod Instructions: Mix all the ingredients, knead thoroughly Put it in the fridge for about 10m Pre-heat the oven to 120°C, roll out the dough about ~5mm thick Bake for 6-8 minutes

item.title: Spätzle
item.description: Ingredients Serves 4 people 400g flour 4 medium sized eggs 1 ts salt 220ml cold water Instructions Heat up a big pot of salted water Mix all ingredients well until bubbles in the dough appear Put the spätzle in the boiling water Once they appear on the surface they’re cooked

item.title: Doriyaki
item.description: Ingredients: 2 eggs 20g sugar 2 Tbsp honey 1/2 ts Vanilla extract 90g flour 1 ts baking powder 10 ml water Instructions: Add eggs, sugar, honey and vanilla in a bowl and stir until the sugar is dissolved Add flour, baking powder, water and whisk it Leave for 10m Set stove to low heat and add dough, when bubbles appear, flip

item.title: Lentil Curry
item.description: Ingredients: 1 sweet potatoe 2 carrots 300g beluga lentils 250g fresh spinach 1 onion 1 garlic clove 1 piece of ginger (thumb sized) 1 tb red curry paste 1 can of diced tomatoes 1 can of coconut milk ~500ml vegetable broth juice of a lime koriander Instructions: Dice onion, garlic and ginger. Cut carrots to discs. Heat a pot, add oil and cook for the diced vegetables for 2m.

item.title: Hazelnutcake
item.description: Ingredients: For the bottom: 70g butter 120g sugar 1 packet vanilla sugar 5 eggs (eiweiß zu schnee schlagen) 140g ground hazelnuts 3 tbsp flour 2 spoon baking soda For the topping: topping: 1/2 package cream. whip it! 1 package cream stiffener Instructions: After baking the bottom, crumble a hole from the center of the bottom, leave the border Add the crumbles to the topping and re-fill the center Add some chocolate sprinkles Coat the border with melted chocolate

item.title: Dal Bhat
item.description: Dal Ingredients 250g brown lentils (no need to soak) 1/2 ts salt 1/2 ts turmeric (turmeric) 1 medium onion, diced 2 tomatoes, diced 2 ts of cumin seeds (cumin) 2 tbsp butter Instructions Wash the lentils thoroughly in cold water twice in a large saucepan, drain They should be evenly distributed on the bottom of the pot Add enough water to the pot so that a little more than 1 1/2 phalanges of the ring finger are in the water above the lentils Add turmeric, bring the lentils to the boil and simmer over low heat The lentals should always be covered with a little water, do not stir Meanwhile, heat the butter in a pan.

item.title: Coconut Icecream
item.description: Ingredients 400ml coconut milk 100ml water 150ml cream 100g sugar 50g coconut flakes 3 egg yolks Steps Cook the coconut milk with the water, let it cool back down Stir egg yolk with sugar until creamy and add coconut flakes Add the cooled down coconut milk to the eggs and mix it well Put everything back to the pot with medium heat to thicken it slightly Let it cool down a bit, stir in the cream Put it in the fridge until cold, then put it to the ice machine

item.title: Indian Pumpkin Chickpea Curry
item.description: Ingredients 1 small onion, finely diced 800g red kuri squash, in small dices 2 carrots, small discs 400g chickpeas (not dried) 1 clove garlic 1 ts ginger, finely chopped 1 Tbsp curry powder 1 pinch of chili powder 1 can coconut milk 500ml vegetable stock 100g red lentils salt coriander Optional: 4 Tbsp mango chutney Instructions Add the ingredients in the above order (the liquids should now just cover the ingredients) Simmer for about 3-4 hours on the highest level or until the pumpkin pieces are quite soft Now add the dried lentils and continue to simmer for about 2 hours on LOW The dish is ready when the pumpkin is soft as butter and everything has a creamy consistency

item.title: Korean Cucumber Salad
item.description: Ingredients 2 Servings 1 big cucumber 1 Tbsp salt 2 cloves garlic 1 spring onion 1 Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp rice vinegar 1 tabespoon sugar 1 tabespoon sesame seeds 1 ts chili flakes 1 ts sesame oil Instructions Wash cucumber, remove skin if desired. Cut it to small pieces and put it in a bowl with 1 Tbsp of salt and leave it for 20m Roast sesame seeds in a frying pan without any oil Chop spring onion and cut garlic and add with all the other ingredients in a bowl Wash the cucumber thouroughly, there should be no salt left Add the cucumber to the bowl, sprinkle with the roasted sesame seeds

item.title: Salt Caramel Cream
item.description: Ingredients 200g sugar 90g butter in cubes 120ml cream 1-2 ts sea salt Instructions Add sugar with a bit of water in a wide pot with a thick bottom. Use medium heat until the sugar turns to golden caramel. Don’t leave it for too long, it will turn bitter Carefully give the butter cubes to the caramel (it’s probably going to splash) Give the cream and whisk thorughly until the caramel is dissolved Add the salt to the pot.

item.title: Ice Cream
item.description: One of Ben & Jerry’s basic ice cream receipes. Ingredients 2 large eggs 125g cup sugar 400ml heavy/whipping cream 200ml milk Instructions Whisk the eggs until light and fluffy for about 1-2m Whisk in the sugar, a little at a time, continue whisking until it’s completely blended. Keep going for about 1 minute more Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend

item.title: Vegetarian Bolognese
item.description: Ingredients 2 tbsp olive oil 2 small onions, finely chopped 1 clove of garlic 200g carrots, cut into small cubes 100g celery, sliced 150g leek, cut into thin rings 150g red pepperbell, cut into cubes 150g zucchini, sliced For the sauce: 800 ml of pureed tomatoes 100 g tomato paste 1 clove of garlic a pinch of sugar oregano some fresh basil leaves Instructions Heat the oil in a separate saucepan and fry the onions, garlic and carrots in it for a few minutes Mix the sauce ingredients in the pot and boil off any residues with roasted substances (Put the lid on and cook for 3.

item.title: Mexican Salsa
item.description: Ingredients 5 tomatoes, peeled 2 red bell pepper 2 green bell pepper 3 medium-large onion 2 chilli pepper juice of 1 lemon 1 Tbsp salt 2 Tbsp sugar Instructions Chop everything Put the diced ingredients in a saucepan without a lid and cook over medium heat for about 1-1,5 hours, until the salsa has a creamy substance Stir often

item.title: Seasoned Soy Sauce
item.description: Ingredients: Soy sauce 1,5 Tbsp Bonito flakes 1,5 Tbsp Mirin 2 ts Sake 1 ts sugar 1/2 ts

item.title: Mushroom Risotto
item.description: Ingredients Serves 4 people 20g dried porcini mushrooms 150g mushrooms 200g oyster mushrooms 1 onion 2 garlic cloves 300g rice 120ml white wine 1.2l vegetable stock 2 spoons of butter 100g parmesan Salt pepper Instructions Soak the porcini mushrooms in 200 ml of warm water for about 30 minutes. Put the boletus on a sieve, don’t throw away the water. Peel the garlic and onion. Cut the latter into fine cubes.

item.title: Do Chua
item.description: Ingredients 500g carrots 500g radish 100g sugar 2 ts of salt 250ml luke warm water 250ml vinegar (5%) containers Instructions Peel the carrots and radish. Then cut into 5x0.5 cm long pieces Put the vegetable pieces in a bowl, add salt and mix well with your hands Mix vinegar with sugar and lukewarm water well until the sugar has completely dissolved The effect of the salt makes the carrots and radish pliable.

item.title: Tofu/Lemongrass Banh Mi
item.description: Ingredients: For the tofu 500 gr tofu 2 EL lemongrass, minced 1-2 garlic cloves, minced 1 ts salt 2 Tbsp sugar pepper 1 chili, minced 4 Tbsp vegetable oil The bread baguette do chua mayonnaise coriander cucumber Instructions: Cut tofu in 1cm wide slices Mix lemon grass, garlic, salt, sugar, pepper, chili and oil Dry the tofu using a towel Rub in both sides of the tofu and let it rest for 15m.

item.title: Flammkuchen / tarte flambée
item.description: Servings Produces 2 Flammkuchen Ingredients: 200g flour 1 ts salt 2 Tbsp oil 110ml water Instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl Knead them for 3 minutes Variations: Gratinée: with Gruyère cheese Forestière: with mushrooms Sweet: dessert version with apples and cinnamon, flambéed with Calvados

item.title: Stuffed Sweetpotatoe
item.description: Ingredients 3 Tbsp of olive oil 1 onion 4 cloves of garlic 1 Tbsp of ginger 15g dried tomatoes 1 lemon 1 ts of chilli flakes 200g chickpeas (already cooked) 200g fresh baby spinach 210ml coconut milk 1 ts of salt 2 sweet potatoes Instructions Preheat the oven to 175°C Rub sweet potatoes with 2 Tbsp of olive oil and loosely wrap each one in a piece of aluminum foil.

item.title: Garlic Sesame Noodles
item.description: Servings 2 Servings Ingredients 4 bunches of ramen noodles 2 Tbsp vegetable oil 1 Tbsp sesame oil 3 cloves of garlic 1 thumb sized piece of ginger 2 ts sugar 1 Tbsp Sriracha sauce 60ml soy sauce 2 stalks of spring onions 200g broccoli Instructions Cook noodles according to instructions Peel and mince garlic and ginger, cut the spring onion Steam the broccoli Heat up a pan using the vegetable oil and saute the garlic and ginger Add sugar, sriracha and soy sauce, mix everything Turn down heat and wait until sauce becomes sticky Add noodles, spring onions and broccoli Add sesame oil, serve

item.title: Sweetpotatoe Soup
item.description: Ingredients One onion, chopped to small pieces Two garlic cloves, chopped 700g sweetpotatoe, chopped into 1cm chunks 3-4 carrots, chopped into small discs 1 can chickpeas around 1.3l broth 1-2 Tbsp lemon juice Fresh coriander Optional: 1 chili pepper Spices (White) pepper Coriander Cumin Instructions Add everything except coriander and lemon juice to the crockpot Cook for 4 hours on high (or 8h on low), blend everything to a fine soup Add the lemon juice Serve with chopped coriander

item.title: Indian Butter Chicken
item.description: Ingredients 600g chicken breast 1 can coconut milk 70g tomato paste 1-2 tb curry paste 1 onion 2 garlic cloves ginger, thumb-sized 2tb butter 2tb yoghurt Spices curry powder kurkuma 1tb garam masala chili powder Steps Chop the onion, garlic and ginger into small bits, add to the bottom of the pot Chop the chicken into bite-sized pieces, add to the pot Add the rest of the ingredients to the pot, stir well Cook for 3.

item.title: Naan
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 block of yeast 2 tb of sugar 150ml milk, room temperature 500g flour 150g yoghurt 1 ts baking powder 1 egg For garlic Naan 2 cloves of garlic Butter Instructions Pour the milk into a bowl, add 1/2 Tbsp sugar and yeast. Stir for a bit. Leave it alone for 20 minutes so that the yeast is dissvoled Once the 20 minutes are over, get another big bowl and put a pinch of salt and the rest of the sugar (1.

item.title: Pizza Dough
item.description: Ingredients 1kg flour type 405 1/4-1/3 cube of yeast 40g salt 625ml water Instructions Add approximately 600g of the flour, the water and the yeast to a big bowl Stir the content until a consistency is formed that reminds you of pancake dough Leave it for 20 minutes. This step is important Stir/knead for 4 to 5 minutes Add the rest of the flour to the bowl, knead for another 2 to 3 minutes Leave for another 20 minutes again Remove the dough from the bowl, put it onto flour covered surface to form a big ball Cut the ball to about 6 to 7 equally sized pieces.

item.title: Lentil Soup
item.description: Ingredients 250g lentals 3-4 rather big potatoes 1 big carrot 1 cellerie 1 onion 0.5 leek 4 wiener sausages cumin parsley 2 bay leaves For seasoning: Vinegar Nutmeg Instructions Chop the onion and the leek Chop the potatoes, carrot and cellerie into equally sized pieces Add the lentals to the crockpot and fill water just until the lentals are covered Cook for 4-5 hours on level high (Optional) 20 minutes before the time is up: If desired, mash the soup ingredients 20 minutes before the time’s up, start chopping the wieners and pour them into the soup.

item.title: Banana Chocolate Bread
item.description: Ingredients 220g flour 1 pinch of salt 0.5 Tbsp baking soda 0.5 Tbsp baking powder 75g chopped dark chocolate 50g hazelnut or walnut 75g butter 75g sugar 2 eggs 2 ripe bananas Steps Add the eggs, sugar, butter and bananas to a bowl, use a mixer or fork to create a evenly mass. Add all other ingredients to another bowl, mix and stir everything. Add the paste from step one.
